name: FRAMETEC GROUP LIMITED
goal: "Frametec Group Limited" is a company promoting, marketing, distributing and selling technologically advanced equipment used for security and statistic purposes.
interests: Borders and Security, Education and training, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: International trade, "ETIAS" program, "EPRIS" program, Home affairs, Interoperability of information systems for migration and security, AMIF / ISF
